segments.content: **[Addy Osmani](https://bsky.app/profile/addyosmani.bsky.social)** (Head of Chrome DX) delivered an exciting review of the latest Chrome DevTools features and highlighted the INP metric. Here’s a summary of the main points covered:
segments.sourceMdx: **[Addy Osmani](https://bsky.app/profile/addyosmani.bsky.social)** (Head of Chrome DX) delivered an exciting review of the latest Chrome DevTools features and highlighted the INP metric. Here’s a summary of the main points covered:
segments.translated_content: **[Addy Osmani](https://bsky.app/profile/addyosmani.bsky.social)**（Chrome开发者体验负责人）精彩解读了Chrome DevTools最新功能，并重点介绍了INP指标。以下是核心要点：

segments.content:
* **Gemini AI in DevTools**: You can now ask it to change the UI, help with errors, or assist with any challenges you might face during development.
* **Server Components and the “Memo” Tag in React DevTools**: This, along with server logs in the browser console in Next.js, enables you to manage Suspense loading states more easily.
* **useDebugValue**: Helps in debugging custom hooks.
* **Font Color Contrast Fixing Tool**: Now built directly into the color picker.
* **Override XHR and Fetch Requests**: Mock data can be injected into these requests, and even headers can be mocked.
segments.sourceMdx:
- **Gemini AI in DevTools**: You can now ask it to change the UI, help with errors, or assist with any challenges you might face during development.
- **Server Components and the “Memo” Tag in React DevTools**: This, along with server logs in the browser console in Next.js, enables you to manage Suspense loading states more easily.
- **useDebugValue**: Helps in debugging custom hooks.
- **Font Color Contrast Fixing Tool**: Now built directly into the color picker.
- **Override XHR and Fetch Requests**: Mock data can be injected into these requests, and even headers can be mocked.
segments.translated_content:
- **DevTools集成Gemini AI**：可实时请求AI修改UI、解决报错或提供开发辅助
- **React DevTools的"Memo"标签**：配合Next.js浏览器控制台的服务器日志，轻松管理Suspense加载状态
- **useDebugValue**：自定义Hook调试利器
- **字体颜色对比度修复工具**：现已内置至取色器
- **XHR/Fetch请求覆写**：支持注入模拟数据及伪造请求头

segments.content: Web app development has evolved to meet the growing demands of users and developers. **[Kent C. Dodds](https://bsky.app/profile/kentcdodds.com)** traces web app evolution from multi-page apps (MPAs) to React Server Components (RSC). Let’s look at the key stages of this evolution highlighted in the talk:
segments.sourceMdx: Web app development has evolved to meet the growing demands of users and developers. **[Kent C. Dodds](https://bsky.app/profile/kentcdodds.com)** traces web app evolution from multi-page apps (MPAs) to React Server Components (RSC). Let’s look at the key stages of this evolution highlighted in the talk:
segments.translated_content: **[Kent C. Dodds](https://bsky.app/profile/kentcdodds.com)** 从多页应用(MPA)到React服务端组件(RSC)，系统梳理了Web应用的演进历程。演讲中重点提及的关键发展阶段：

segments.content:
* **Multi-Page Applications** (MPA) is simple and effective, but requires a full page reload.
* **Progressively Enhanced MPAs** (PEMPA) introduced JavaScript for partial updates and UX improvement but added complexity and server-client duplication.
* **Single-Page Applications** (SPA) improved interactivity but required client-side networking and managing loading states, increasing complexity.
* **Progressively Enhanced SPAs** (PESPA) brought server-side fetching and rendering, improving UX. Yet, tying logic to routes limited reusable components.
* **React Server Componentss** enable full-stack, reusable components, simplifying workflows while improving speed and scalability.
segments.sourceMdx:
- **Multi-Page Applications** (MPA) is simple and effective, but requires a full page reload.
- **Progressively Enhanced MPAs** (PEMPA) introduced JavaScript for partial updates and UX improvement but added complexity and server-client duplication.
- **Single-Page Applications** (SPA) improved interactivity but required client-side networking and managing loading states, increasing complexity.
- **Progressively Enhanced SPAs** (PESPA) brought server-side fetching and rendering, improving UX. Yet, tying logic to routes limited reusable components.
- **React Server Componentss** enable full-stack, reusable components, simplifying workflows while improving speed and scalability.
segments.translated_content:
- **多页应用(MPA)**：简单有效但需整页刷新
- **渐进增强MPA(PEMPA)**：引入JavaScript实现局部更新，却带来复杂度与逻辑重复
- **单页应用(SPA)**：提升交互性但需客户端网络请求与加载状态管理
- **渐进增强SPA(PESPA)**：服务端预取渲染改善体验，但路由绑定逻辑限制了组件复用
- **React服务端组件(RSC)**：实现全栈可复用组件，在提升性能的同时简化工作流

segments.content: ## Out Of Order Streaming - The Secret Powering Modern React
segments.sourceMdx: ## Out Of Order Streaming - The Secret Powering Modern React
segments.translated_content: ## 乱序流式渲染：现代React的隐秘核心

segments.content: ![Theo speaking](/emails/conferences/2024/react-summit-us/theo.jpg)
segments.sourceMdx: ![Theo speaking](/emails/conferences/2024/react-summit-us/theo.jpg)
segments.translated_content: ![Theo speaking](/emails/conferences/2024/react-summit-us/theo.jpg)

segments.content: **[Theo Browne](https://bsky.app/profile/t3.gg)** explores one of React's most innovative advancements—out-of-order streaming. Streaming HTML in web applications allows browsers to **progressively render incomplete HTML as it arrives**, significantly improving **perceived performance**. This is especially valuable for SSR. The only limitation was the order of the elements. HTML is linear, meaning that a slow component at the top of the HTML will block other components below.
segments.sourceMdx: **[Theo Browne](https://bsky.app/profile/t3.gg)** explores one of React's most innovative advancements—out-of-order streaming. segments.translated_content: **[Theo Browne](https://bsky.app/profile/t3.gg)** 探讨了React最具创新性的进步之一——乱序流式渲染。网页应用中的HTML流式传输允许浏览器**逐步渲染接收到的非完整HTML**，显著提升**感知性能**，这对服务端渲染(SSR)尤为重要。唯一的限制在于元素顺序——HTML是线性的，位于HTML顶部的慢速组件会阻塞下方其他组件的渲染。

segments.content: This limitation was solved by using RSC. The `<template/>` and `<script/>` tags are used to identify placeholders for unresolved content and replace them dynamically when data becomes available.
segments.sourceMdx: This limitation was solved by using RSC. The `<template/>` and `<script/>` tags are used to identify placeholders for unresolved content and replace them dynamically when data becomes available.
segments.translated_content: 这个限制通过React服务端组件(RSC)得以解决。利用`<template/>`和`<script/>`标签标识未解析内容的占位符，并在数据可用时动态替换它们。

segments.content: Recent advancements, such as **partial pre-rendering and dynamic IO in Next.js**, combine static and dynamic rendering. This hybrid approach allows initial static content to be cached on CDNs for faster loads, with subsequent dynamic updates streamed from the server, optimizing both speed and developer workflow. These methods revolutionize SSR by enhancing UX and supporting complex web interactions seamlessly.

This hybrid approach allows initial static content to be cached on CDNs for faster loads, with subsequent dynamic updates streamed from the server, optimizing both speed and developer workflow. These methods revolutionize SSR by enhancing UX and supporting complex web interactions seamlessly.
segments.translated_content: 最新技术如**Next.js中的部分预渲染和动态IO**结合了静态与动态渲染。这种混合方案允许将初始静态内容缓存在CDN上加速加载，后续动态更新通过服务端流式传输，同时优化了速度和开发流程。这些方法通过提升用户体验和无缝支持复杂交互，彻底革新了服务端渲染。

segments.content: **[Shruti Kapoor](https://bsky.app/profile/shrutikapoor08.bsky.social)** (Frontend engineer at Slack) provides an overview of the forthcoming stable update to the React library, which promises a lot of new and exciting things. The key features of this new version of React:
segments.sourceMdx: **[Shruti Kapoor](https://bsky.app/profile/shrutikapoor08.bsky.social)** (Frontend engineer at Slack) provides an overview of the forthcoming stable update to the React library, which promises a lot of new and exciting things. The key features of this new version of React:
segments.translated_content: **[Shruti Kapoor](https://bsky.app/profile/shrutikapoor08.bsky.social)**（Slack前端工程师）概述了即将发布的React稳定版更新，该版本将带来诸多激动人心的新特性：

segments.content:
* **React actions**: functions that use async transitions. It also supported on the server.
* **New hooks**: `useActionState` and `useFormStatus` will make building forms easier. `useOptimistic` will provide fancy way to make UI smooth.
* **React Compiler**: new plugin for React, that will say goodbye to `useMemo` and `useCallback`
* **New API**: `use` - read resources and Promises inside of your component.
* **`ref` change**: finally it is a prop, so say goodbye to `forwardRef`
* **Improved errors**: errors became more descriptive
* **Context change**: Render `<Context>` instead of `<Context.Provider>`
segments.sourceMdx:
- **React actions**: functions that use async transitions. It also supported on the server.
- **New hooks**: `useActionState` and `useFormStatus` will make building forms easier. `useOptimistic` will provide fancy way to make UI smooth.
- **React Compiler**: new plugin for React, that will say goodbye to `useMemo` and `useCallback`
- **New API**: `use` \- read resources and Promises inside of your component.
- **`ref` change**: finally it is a prop, so say goodbye to `forwardRef`
- **Improved errors**: errors became more descriptive
- **Context change**: Render `<Context>` instead of `<Context.Provider>`
segments.translated_content:
- **React Actions**：使用异步过渡的函数，服务端同样支持
- **新Hook**：`useActionState`和`useFormStatus`简化表单构建，`useOptimistic`实现丝滑UI过渡
- **React编译器**：新插件将告别手动`useMemo`和`useCallback`
- **新API**：`use`——在组件内读取资源和Promise
- **ref变更**：终于成为普通prop，无需再使用`forwardRef`
- **错误改进**：错误信息更具描述性
- **上下文变更**：直接渲染`<Context>`而非`<Context.Provider>`

segments.content: Developers can enhance accessibility by writing clean HTML with proper tags and attributes. Accessibility tools can test and ensure your work is functional. Adding accessibility scans like **axe-core** or **lighthouse-cli** to your CI/CD pipeline can further streamline this process.
